name: DiscoverItaly
0:
”Alexa, open discover italy”
”Alexa, tell us a fact from discover italy”
”Alexa, give me a fact from discover italy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: discover italy
des: There is no place like Italy. No culture, no history, nothing like the beautiful boot-shaped land. If you love history, architecture, museums, great food, shopping, historical monuments, and great gelato, then head to Rome and go explore the amazing atmosphere. From technology, to philosophy, religion and government the Italians have left a permanent footprint on the modern world. Enjoy some of our favorite facts about the land of the Romans.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
